name: Nino
review: Absolutely loved this fizzy gem! So alive and fun, perfect for brunch.

name: Marcus
review: Great energy, slight funk, but that's Pet-Nat life. Would drink again.

name: Giorgi
review: Textbook Saperavi. Dark fruit, bold, and smooth. Love this vintage.

name: Anna
review: Really crisp and nutty. Lovely acidity and structure!

name: Thomas
review: Nice oak influence, but the tannins were a bit rough for me.
